changes.comment: Add a "pinnedVersions" option to rush.json, which will add dependencies to the top-level package.json. These dependencies are resolved first, and thus this mechanism can be used to control versions of second-level dependencies.

Add a "pinnedVersions" option to rush.json, which will add dependencies to the top-level package.json. These dependencies are resolved first, and thus this mechanism can be used to control versions of second-level dependencies.
